main.name: Andre Peixoto
main.description: Working as a JS/TS Fullstack Developer
main.bio: My name is Andre, and I live and work in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
main.biocomplement: I currently work remotely as a Fullstack Software Engineer at Twiage Inc., a US based company, developing hospital communication software.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to talk about software development and possible projects.

resume.skillmessage: These are some of my technical skills:

education.degree: Fullstack JavaScript (ReactJS, React Native, Node.js) Bootcamp

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
I've been working in Twiage's development team with front and back-end programming, from web to app development. 
Our current stack is Node, Vue 3, Swift, Kotlin and Flutter. 
Twiage is a pioneer emergency care platform for pre-hospital communication that reduces drastically the triage time for patients. Twiage has a pursue for excellence and continuous innovation at its core, and has been in business for several years providing top level services for Hospitals and EMS agencies all over the United States.

work.title: Flutter Developer
work.description: Worked on MAB, a telemedicine start-up, developing its Flutter app aiming the creation of an inclusive and user-friendly App for connecting Patients and Doctors, while also giving to the Patient ownership of all their medical data/history through the App.

work.title: English Teacher
work.description: Worked as a C2-level ESL Teacher helping teenagers and adults learn and master the English language.

work.title: IT Coordinator and Business Advisor
work.description: Conducted IT management, such as network and applications support, both in person and remotely. Develops Business consulting services, aiming greater ROI and customer satisfaction.
